short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes your website performances by measuring the time it takes to load the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're reading these lines, your website is probably slow and suffers from bad performances. But don't worry, it can be fixed! This is why SpeedMeter exists.

SpeedMeter is a free powerful Chrome extension designed specifically for developers who want to optimize their website’s performance through code.

With SpeedMeter, you can easily analyze API calls and JavaScript performance, identify bottlenecks, and get actionable insights to boost your site's speed and improve your SEO rankings.

Key Features:
• API Performance Analysis: Monitor and evaluate the performance of your website’s API calls. Get detailed reports on response times and optimize accordingly.

• Real-Time Data: Get real-time feedback on your website’s performance directly within your browser. No need to switch between tools – SpeedMeter provides all the insights you need in one place.

• User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, intuitive interface that makes performance optimization straightforward, even for complex websites.

Why use SpeedMeter?

In today’s fast-paced digital world, website performance is crucial. Slow load times can lead to lost visitors, lower SEO rankings, and decreased conversions. SpeedMeter empowers you to take control of your website’s performance, ensuring a faster, more efficient user experience.
